item.title: mtcars Data Analysis
item.description: Preamble: This document focuses on the analysis of the mtcars dataframe. Description of dataframe mtcars can be found at https://stat.ethz.ch/R-manual/R-devel/library/datasets/html/mtcars.html Research questions: is a vehicle with auto or manual transmission better in terms of miles p/gallons(mpg)? quantify the (mpg) difference between auto & manual transmission. Structure of analysis: I will asssess both queries from different perspectives employing a set of methodologies that can be broadly grouped as follows:
